text: avara balige ondu puraveyu bandaga avaru ‘‘allahana dutarugalige nidiruvantahaddanne namage nidalaguva tanaka navu nambuvudilla’’ ennuttare. Tanna dautyavannu hege kaluhisabekendu allahanu cennagi ballanu. A aparadhigalu begane allahana bali ghora apamanavannu edurisaliddare mattu tam'ma dusta sancugala karana bhari yatanege guriyagaliddare
